member.name: T:IO.Objects.USB.HID.Messenger
member.summary: Encapsulates USB raw HID devices, using the HidSharp library.

member.name: M:IO.Objects.USB.HID.Messenger.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Create a 64-byte messenger object bound to a USB HID device.
member.param: Time in milliseconds to wait for read and write operations to complete. Zero means wait forever.

member.name: P:IO.Objects.USB.HID.Messenger.Info
member.summary: Information string from the USB HID device.

member.name: M:IO.Objects.USB.HID.Messenger.Send(IO.Interfaces.Message64.Message)
member.summary: Send a 64-byte message to a USB HID device.

member.name: M:IO.Objects.USB.HID.Messenger.Receive(IO.Interfaces.Message64.Message)
member.summary: Receive a 64-byte message from a USB HID device.

member.name: M:IO.Objects.USB.HID.Messenger.Transaction(IO.Interfaces.Message64.Message,IO.Interfaces.Message64.Message)
member.summary: Send a 64-byte command message to and receive a 64-byte response message from a USB HID device.

member.name: T:IO.Objects.Message64.UDP.Messenger
member.summary: 64-Byte Message Transport Client Services using UDP (User Datagram Protocol).

member.summary: Constructor for a 64-byte Messenger instance using UDP.
member.param: UDP server domain name or IP address.
Receive timeout in milliseconds. Zero indicates wait forever.

member.summary: Send a 64-byte command message to a raw HID device.

member.summary: Receive a 64-byte response message from a raw HID device.

member.summary: Send a 64-byte command message and receive a 64-byte response message.

member.name: T:IO.Objects.Motor.PWM.Output
member.summary: Encapsulates motors controlled by PWM and GPIO outputs.

member.name: M:IO.Objects.Motor.PWM.Output.#ctor(IO.Interfaces.GPIO.Pin,IO.Interfaces.PWM.Output,System.Double)
member.summary: Constructor for a single motor, using one GPIO pin for direction control, and one PWM output for speed control.
member.param: Initial normalized motor velocity. Allowed values are -1.0 (full speed reverse) to +1.0 (full speed forward.

member.name: M:IO.Objects.Motor.PWM.Output.#ctor(IO.Interfaces.PWM.Output,IO.Interfaces.PWM.Output,System.Double)
member.summary: Constructor for a single motor, using two PWM outputs for clockwise and counterclockwise rotation control.
member.param: PWM output instance (for clockwise rotation control).
PWM output instance (for counterclockwise rotation control).
Initial normalized motor velocity. Allowed values are -1.0 (full speed reverse) to +1.0 (full speed forward.

member.name: P:IO.Objects.Motor.PWM.Output.velocity
member.summary: Write-only property for setting the normalized motor velocity. Allowed values are -1.0 (full speed reverse) to +1.0 (full speed forward.

member.name: T:IO.Objects.Motor.Servo.Output
member.summary: Encapsulates motors controlled by servo outputs (e.g. continuous rotation servos).

member.summary: Consructor for a single motor output.
member.param: Initial normalized motor velocity. Allowed values are -1.0 (full speed reverse) to +1.0 (full speed forward.

member.name: P:IO.Objects.Motor.Servo.Output.velocity
member.summary: Write-only property for setting the normalized motor velocity. Allowed values are -1.0 (full speed reverse) to +1.0 (full speed forward.

member.summary: Encapsulates servo outputs using PWM outputs.

member.summary: Constructor for a single servo output.

member.summary: Write-only property for setting the servo position. Allowed values are -1.0 to +1.0.

member.summary: Write bytes to an SPI slave device.
member.param: Number of bytes to write: 1 to 57.

member.summary: Write and read bytes to and from an SPI slave device.

Delay in microseconds between write and read operations: 0 to 65535.
Number of bytes to read: 0 to 60.
